rep.text: You have achieved much in the short time you have been with us. However you are yet to challenge your final foe.
Zar'don. He gave up his soul gain immense power in return. You are to challenge him.
And how am I supposed to defeat him if he is that strong?
He is strong, but not allpowerful. There are people who are ready to fight on your side. Zar'Don only fights alone as he is too proud.
So we just overpower him with our numbers?
Be careful though, do not underestimate him! Time for you to go...
